concept.title: What is Square?
concept.shortdesc: Square, Inc is a financial service and mobile payment company based in San Francisco, California. Square, Inc has various products and services. This guide will focus on Square Reader and eCommerce tool, which spreads across multiple platforms, such as PC, mobile phone, and tablet.

conbody.section:
With Square, users can accomplish tasks such as:
Accept credit and debit payments using the Square Reader
The ability to virtually connect to any of their devices
Manage and upkeep an online shop
Manage a fully customizable point of sale
Track customer spending habits
Deposit funds into a bank account
Set up gift cards
And much more

section.title: The Square Reader
section.p: The Square reader is a free mobile compatible companion that allows buyers to pay on the spot with a credit or debit card. The reader connects to most mobile devices via a 3.5mm audio jack.

image.alt: Square reader for iPhones that lack a 3.5 mm audio port

section.p: There are also options available for iPhone 7 (or later) users that utilize the Lightning charge port instead of the 3.5mm audio jack.
For an additional $29.99, a contactless card/chip reader is available that uses a Bluetooth connection.
